transcription.text: Where does the living body begin and where does it end? By peering under our skin we reveal the tidal rhythms of oxygen flowing through the branching ecosystem of the human body. Marshmallow Laser Feast aims to challenge notions of boundaries between us and our environment with The Tides Within Us. These prints are part of a larger video work that features interactive screens that allow you to explore the human ecosystem to paint a picture of the human body as a fluid event.

work.title: The Tides Within Us print series
